quest_desc.qdesc: 300115(다크엘프의 목걸이) 아르젠타에게 의뢰 수락 1번맵에서 데이비드와 조우. 2번 맵에서 다시 데이비드와 대화. 3번 맵에서 보스맵 가기 전의 데이비드와 대화. 보스전 마친 후 데이비드와 대화. 목걸이 습득. 아르젠타에게 보고.

qnpc.npckname: 아르젠타의 두번째 노예 데이비드(돌아오지 못하는 길)

talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Adventurer David$
Seems like you are waiting for my signature here. Heh.
(You must receive the quest from Argenta at Gray Ruins to proceed.)

$Adventurer David$
Heh. Heh. Heh. Only people like me qualified to be Argenta's Great Knight. Now, don’t be jealous. Heh.
(Adventurer David happily dreaming in his own world.)

$Adventurer David$
Heh. Heh. Heh. Argenta going crazy over me? Heh... My charm is unstoppable these day. Heh. Heh. Heh.
(You need to obtain the Quest from Argenta in Gray Ruins to proceed)

$Argenta$
Rumor has it, Elena ran away like a weakling? That Dark Elf must be in hopping mad now. Hehe.

$Argenta$
Of course not. Who said that?
Anyway, kids are always being so arrogant when I release them for a little bit. Hmm.

$Argenta$
I have something for you, just for you. Find me when you are alone.
(You cannot proceed the quest while in a party.)

$Argenta$
Pollution are under control for this moment, but this is yet to be over. So you, {user_nick}!! Go to Road of No Return and defeat more of Dark Elves.

$Argenta$
Yes. Bring me the Dark Elf's Necklace from Dark Elves as a proof.
I am sure you are capable of doing that, right?

$Argenta$
The necklace is crafted with a decent jewel, but I don't need it. I just want you to bring it to me for the sake of my curiousity on your ability. . Quite asking me for more details! Just do it, now!
<html>$Argenta and Dark Elf$</html>

$Argenta$
{user_nick}!!
Don't pretend to be lazy!
(You cannot fulfill the work while in Abyss Difficulty.)

$Adventurer David$
Do you know how long I've been here waiting for you,{user_nick}!!!
(Adventurer David is calling you with loud voice.)

$Adventurer David$
Heh. Heh. Heh. You cannot escape me. Because I have eyes of the falcon! Nothing, nothing can escape my falcon eyes!!!
(Adventurer David is pointing at his beady eyes.)

$Adventurer David$
I saw this amazingly gorgeous woman. My eyes almost got blind when I saw her! She looked like a rose that fall into a gutteror a diamond that littered on the mud… No Ruby… No… i mean... Anyway... I saw you were with a beautiful woman!!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Pity? Dreamy? Argenta? You got to be kidding, right?.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
The gorgeous woman was pitifully leaning on a tree at Gray Ruins, and glaze at you with dreamy eyes!
Why are you still denying? You immoral fellow!!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html> What's wrong with being named... <FONT color=#382000>{user_nick}!</font> </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
Ooh, Did you just say the gorgeous, pitiful, and dreamy woman's name is Argenta? Heh. Heh. Heh. I can already imagine the fabulous smell on her name!! Her name differs widely from your name, {user_nick}!!

$Adventurer David${action:Talk}
Heh. Heh. Heh. All this while i have been wondering why are you being so unnecessarynice to her. But the mystery has been solved just now!! Ahah~ I am so impressed with my own intelligence.

$Adventurer David$
So. What can I do for you today? Did the gorgeous, pitiful, and dreamy lady ask a Newbie like you to do with teary eyes?

$Adventurer David$
So Dark Elf, huh... Heh. I, Great Adventurer David can not just Dark Elf by just staring at it. Heh. Heh. Heh. Hey you, Newbie! You should feel lucky that you meet me today. Heh.

$Adventurer David$
Heh! Argenta to yourself? I cannot let you do that! Why don't you stay here and watch my brillant skills? (He looked at the sky after confidently shouts himself)

$Adventurer David${action:Talk}
Heh. Heh. Heh. If you were to compete with me, I am very sure you won't be able to win. Not even a chance! Heh. Heh. Heh.

$Adventurer David$
Heh! Argenta to yourself? I cannot let you do that! Why don't you stay here and watch my brillant skills? (He looked at the sky after confidently shouts himself)

$Adventurer David$
Heh. Heh. Heh. Afraid? I was never afraid of any monster!!
Never!!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html> Can I make my move now? </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
A Newbie like you dare to judge me as a Coward! In the name of In the name of strategy and tactics! is the reason why I am encamping here.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Why not you go defeat them right now instead of wasting time?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
Heh. Heh. Heh. Needless to say, there is not need for you to enter here, I will be the one slaying those Dark Elves.

$Adventurer David${action:Talk}
What a Newbie you are. Heh. I am actually setting up and ambush for those Dark Elves. Are you admiring my patience? It seems like you did since you can't close your mouth. Heh. Heh. Heh. You can admire for as long as you like. Heh.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html> If you don't mind, just me through. </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
Well, there is a word saying that if you want to defeat a Dragon then you need to go to Dragon Nest. It's not a bad idea that we go looking for Dark Elves instead of waiting for them to come. Ha. Ha. Ha. Since I have full of generosity, if you want me to go with you, I will go with you. Ha.

$Adventurer David$
{user_nick}, since you are begging me i got no choice but to specially. help you. Let's go! Heh Heh. Heh.

$Adventurer David$
There's no need to admire me to that extend. Heh. Heh. Heh. I am willing to suffer a little bit of hardship for helping a Newbie, this is part of my duty as a Great Adventurer. Heh heh heh.
(Adventurer David has already stop listening to you long ago.)

$Adventurer David$
{user_nick}, I will made an exception and accompany you since you are desprately asking for help. Heh... Alright then, let's go. Heh Heh. Heh.

$Adventurer David${action:talk}Hey Newbie, it seems like you yet to retrieve the Dark Elf's Necklace. Heh heh heh.
But no worries!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html> Uh ... yeah .... (Looks like I have no choice but to defeat them) </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
Heh. Just trust me! Heh. Heh. Heh. You can retrieve that necklace from Ogre Chubaka's, Fort Headquarters Dark Elf. Heh. Heh. Heh.

$Adventurer David$
Behold my achievements and let Lady Argenta know!! Heh. Heh. Heh.
(Adventurer David arrogance is acting up again.)

$Adventurer David$
Behold my achievements and let Lady Argenta know!! Heh. Heh. Heh.
(Adventurer David arrogance is acting up again.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Aren't you hiding? I don’t remember seeing you there. </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
Heh. Heh. Heh. It looks like you acquired the Necklace when I was fighting with Ogre Chubaka. Dark Elf is a nothing when you compare to Ogre Chubaka. Ha.

$Adventurer David$
What do you mean? You didn't manage to see my movement is due to my super speed! A Newbie like you will never match up to my speed!!! Heh. Heh. Heh.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(What does Argenta have anything related to this?)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
Are you pushing the blame of your ignorance to others? Anyway, i believe you agree how Great I am. Heh. Heh. Heh. Lady Agrenta will think that I am more capable that you by now. Heh.

$Adventurer David$
Hurry and tell MY Lady Argenta every little detail of my awesome uncomparable speed achievements. Heh. Heh. Heh.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Just who do you think you are?)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
Heh. Heh. Heh. There is a huge gap in the difference between you and I! If you are a weak beginner , then I am the hero!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(The beauty of our Elves and Orcs is very different.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
Heh. Heh. Heh. Seem like you are jealous. Well, you are cute. But if I compare Argenta and you, then Argenta is the sky and you are the earth! It's like between Hero Nerwin and Orc!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(There's no point being angry with him)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
Heh. Heh. Heh. There is a big difference between you and I! If you are a novice and I am the Hero!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html> (This child needs to be taught a lesson!) </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
Heh. Heh. Heh. Seem like you are jealous. Well, you are cute. But if I compare Argenta and you, then Argenta is the sky and you are the earth! It's like between Hero Nerwin and Orc!

$Adventurer David$
Heh. Heh. Heh. It will be awkward if Lady Argenta falls in love with me. But I should not reject a woman like her as this is not what a hero will do. Haeh.
(Adventurer David living in his big dream.)

$Self-styled Adventuer David$
Hoho, are you jealous? Heh..you're cute but you are far from being a mellow beauty!!
Different!!! Like the sky and the earth! Significantly different!!!

$Adventurer David$
Heh. Heh. Heh. There's no need for you to be jealous of me even when become a Lady Argenta's Personal Knight. The worldis fair. Heh.
(Adventurer David is still stuck in his big dream.)

$Argenta$
Late! What took you so long? What is that? Why did you bring a lump along with you?
(Argenta is pointing at other direction. You can see the guy with a familiar face is hiding.)
You didn't know "that" was following you. Did you?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(You hand her the Dark Elf's Necklace.)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
Save the explanation, is not worth my attention anyway. I have no interest in other people except my slave.
Now, let me see what you brought.

$Argenta$
Took you so long just for this necklace?
I thought you were dead in somewhere.
Well, since you are here alive, I will forgive you.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html> ... Well I'm not quite finished with it yet. </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
Of course. Who else is gonna run my errands when I only have one slaves which is you?
Don't be lazy, understand?
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

$Argenta$
Of course, there's more. Why? Are you tired already?
You are still young to be tired so easily.

$Adventurer David$
Heh. Heh. Heh. Are you jealous of me even if I become a Lady Argenta's Great Knight. The world isn'tfair. Heh.
(Adventurer David is still trap in his big dream.)

$Adventurer David${action:Talk}
Heh. Heh. Heh. Did Lady Argenta already fall in love with me?
No one can resist my charms. Heh. Heh. Heh.

journal.title: Elena's trail
journal.contents:
Even though Elena has been disappeared, Argenta thinks there are something that need to take care of at the Road of No Return. Go defeat Dark Elves and bring the Dark Elf's Necklace as a proof.

※You cannot proceed it while in a party

Cristal Stream (Sigh Canyon Entrance) → Road of No Return
journal.destination: (Solo) Explore the Road of No Return.

journal.title: Adventurer David's Lady
journal.contents:
Surprisingly, Adventurer David's beautiful, pitiful, and dreamy lady is Argenta. He might do something very stupid again, but for now, let's ignore him and move forward.

Cristal Stream (Sigh Canyon Entrance) → Road of No Return
journal.destination: Explore the Road of No Return.
journal.todo_msg: The necklace is not here. Advanced forward to look elsewhere.

journal.title: Where is the necklace?
journal.contents:
Seems likeAdventurer David is also looking for the Dark Elf's Necklace. But he was afriad to go alone.Adventurer David might follow you again but you need to move forward until you get the necklace that Argenta requested.

Cristal Stream (Sigh Canyon Entrance) → Road of No Return.
journal.destination: Explore the Road of No Return.
journal.todo_msg: The necklace is not here. Advanced forward to look elsewhere.

journal.title: Dark Elf Necklace
journal.contents:
According to Adventurer David words, you can obtain the Necklace from Ogre Chubaka's servant, Dark Elves. Let's defeat Dark Elves in their main base and acquire the necklace.

Cristal Stream (Sigh Canyon Entrance) → Road of No Return
journal.todo_msg: Please defeat Ogre Chubaka's servant, Dark Elf.

journal.title: Necklace obtained.
journal.contents:
You have obtain Dark Elf's Necklace. After defeating all the monsters, let's go talk to Adventurer David who hides himself without helping you.

Road of No Return → Adventurer David
journal.todo_msg: You have obtain Dark Elf's Necklace. Please talk to Adventurer David.

journal.title: Safe Return
journal.contents:
Adventurer David did nothign to help after all. Ultimately, you got Dark Elf's Necklace, so now let's go back to Gray Ruins and report to Argenta.

Gray Ruins → Argenta
journal.todo_msg: Please report to Argenta in Ash Ruins.
